title: Covid, Ancient Migrations, Peer Review, Language, Nobel Prize
description: Football Euro: Study shows the impact on Covid-19 infectionsThe impact of the European Soccer (Football) Championship 2020 on the incidence of the Corona pandemic across Europe.Ancient DNA Charts Native...
contentHtml:
Football Euro: Study shows the impact on Covid-19 infections

The impact of the European Soccer (Football) Championship 2020 on the incidence of the Corona pandemic across Europe.

Ancient DNA Charts Native Americans’ Journeys to Asia Thousands of Years Ago

Native Americans traveled back and forth to Asia thousands of years ago, well before Europeans discovered America.

The rise and fall of peer review

Why the greatest scientific experiment in history failed, and why that's a great thing.

Language Diversity in Scholarly Publishing

Study of the language diversity in scholarly publishing, using a sample of the more than 100 million publications with Crossref.

Interview with Edmond Fischer: pianist, microbe hunter, pilot, and Napoleon expert

Interview with Edmond Fisher who shared the 1992 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

References
